channel.title: Posts on José Ignacio Orlando
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on José Ignacio Orlando

item.title: Convocatoria para Postulantes a Becas Doctorales CONICET 2020 y CIC-PBA 2020
item.description: Abrimos una convocatoria para postulantes a Becas CONICET 2020 y CIC-PBA 2020.

item.title: Convocatoria para Estudiantes Avanzados de Ingeniería - Becas INI 2020
item.description: Estamos entrevistando candidatos para aplicar a las becas de ingreso a la investigación de la Secretaría de Ciencia, Arte y Tecnología de la UNICEN.

item.title: Presentation @ IMAGE AI in Leuven (Belgium)
item.description: I will present some of the key conlusions of the REFUGE challenge at IMAGE AI.

item.title: Convocatoria para Estudiantes Avanzados de Ingeniería - EVC-CIN 2019
item.description: Estamos entrevistando candidatos para aplicar a las becas de estímulo a las vocaciones científicas EVC 2019 del CIN (Consejo Universitario Nacional).

item.title: Moving back to Argentina
item.description: I’m moving back to Argentina to join again PLADEMA as a CONICET funded Assistant Researcher.

item.title: Our paper was accepted for IJCARS!
item.description: Our paper with Santiago Vitale, Emmanuel Iarussi and Ignacio Larrabide on US simulation using CycleGANs was accepted for publication at the International Journal of Computer Assisted Radiology and Surgery.

item.title: Our paper was accepted for MICCAI!
item.description: Our paper with Rhona Asgari on simultaneous outer retinal layers and drusen segmentation was accepted at MICCAI 2019!

item.title: Two papers accepted for ISBI 2019!
item.description: Our two papers on automated retinal OCT image analysis using deep learning have been accepted for presentation at ISBI 2019.

item.title: Presentation at UBA
item.description: I presented our work on machine learning for ophthalmic image analysis at University of Buenos Aires.

item.title: REFUGE: Retinal Fundus Glaucoma Challenge
item.description: REFUGE as part of OMIA, at MICCAI 2018

item.title: Our paper was accepted for MICCAI 2018!
item.description: Our paper with João Barbosa Breda, Karel van Keer, Matthew B. Blascko, Pablo J. Blanco and Carlos A. Bulant has been accepted for presentation in MICCAI 2018.

item.title: NVIDIA Hardware Grant
item.description: My application to the NVIDIA Hardware Grant was successful!

item.title: I've defended my PhD thesis!
item.description: In September 11 I’ve defended my PhD thesis.

item.title: Our ISBI 2019 was accepted for oral presentation!
item.description: Our U2-Net paper was accepted for oral presentation at ISBI 2019.
